name: Stickman's Bad Luck
description:
Enter the world of a stick man named Stickman who, reluctantly compelled by the winds of destiny, must save the land from an evil stick man named Evil Stickman!

Stickman's Bad Luck is a short, story-rich 2D Platformer. As a Medroidvania game, you will traverse new places as you unlock pathways with the items you collect.

Originally published many years ago, this remastered version of Stickman's Bad Luck features improved music, updated graphics, bug fixes, and some extra surprises along the way.
